name: Spot The Difference? - Find the Hidden Objects
name_original: Spot The Difference? - Find the Hidden Objects
description:
Find the differences between two photos before time run out!

*FEATURES*
- Beautiful Pictures, HD Quality
- Addictive Gameplay That Is Fun For Everyone!
- Amazing Hidden Objects Design!
- Catchy Sound Effects!

*HOW TO PLAY*
Find and tap the differences between two images! Find all the differences to get the next puzzle!
Get one wrong and lose some time!

It's an addictive spot the differences game with excellent puzzle design and colorful pictures, full of challenges and fun!
